title: Ben Ben Yu Jiling Zhi Yishi Xingqiu Xin
title_japanese: 笨笨与机灵之遗失星球新
synopsis: Stupid Bear and Clever Dog found a strange machine in the tunnel near the town. Due to misoperation, they sent themselves to a strange planet, which is the Five Planets. It turns out that this machine is an instrument made by Xiangxianglang that can travel between stars. According to legend, their Weasel family helped the Five Planets build an underground castle with a huge number of energy coins hidden inside. In order to obtain energy coins, Xiangxianglang tricked the Lone Wolf and the Lost Brother Lan to be their helpers and came to the Five Planets. The five planets once had a high degree of civilization. Due to the excessive development of resources to produce energy coins, the environmental pollution was so serious that the people of the five planets fled their homes one after another. The five planets who temporarily lived on the earth brought the cat Xiaoduoduo to stop Xiangxianglang and them, accidentally saving the dumb and clever. And use energy coins to help... (translated from youku)
